body: i know its just another spam post but like if u can block this i dont get how a single other staff hasnt even replied to my appeal when hes clearly not active. and Im literlly banned over something that is invalided my cousin literlly copied my ign i dont know what u want me to say.

replies.body: I will alert the staff member of your appeal. In the mean time, please don't create any more spam threads. Thanks!
